permissions: User must be an admin or a member of a broker organization associated with the gauge vehicle to update it.
side_effects: Updates gauge vehicle trailer and/or tractor assignments; providing an empty value clears the corresponding assignment.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required (example: 123). At least one of --trailer or --tractor must be specified.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.validation: Example: 456. If provided as an empty string, the trailer assignment is cleared.

flags.name: --tractor
flags.validation: Example: 789. If provided as an empty string, the tractor assignment is cleared.
